value.name: After San Jose shooting: Confirm new ATF chief to police the gun industry and save lives
value.description: Break the gun lobby’s stranglehold on the ATF and allow it to protect Americans. It needs money, freedom to do its work, and an experienced director.

about.name: Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives

value.name: 8 charged after year-long drug task force investigation
value.description: Eight people — many part of one family — were charged recently after an investigation into alleged drug trafficking in two small communities.

value.name: Providence police chief: Autistic child found living in squalor, mother charged
value.description: Law enforcement serving warrants in Webster County on Friday found something unexpected -- a child with autism held in a room covered in human waste.

value.name: Webster Co. woman arrested on drug and abuse charges pleads not guilty
value.description: A Webster County woman arrested on drug and criminal abuse charges has pleaded not guilty. Police say they went to 27-year old Felicia Terrell’s home to serve a drug warrant. That’s where they say they found a young child in filthy conditions.

value.name: Providence suspect wanted on drug charges accused of child abuse

value.name: West Linn continues to mull police oversight structure
